ticket.title: [Patch] Lingering use of ActiveRecord::NamedScope::Scope
ticket.original-body: I don't remember how I triggered this issue but there is a lingering use of ActiveRecord::NamedScope::Scope after Pratik removed it. I don't have any tests but here is the fix. http://github.com/xspond/rails/commit/74478bdb2df9439ed8039c180a7745d449bc1247
ticket.latest-body: I don't remember how I triggered this issue but there is a lingering use of ActiveRecord::NamedScope::Scope after Pratik removed it. I don't have any tests but here is the fix. http://github.com/xspond/rails/commit/74478bdb2df9439ed8039c180a7745d449bc1247
ticket.original-body-html:
I don't remember how I triggered this issue but there is a lingering use of ActiveRecord::NamedScope::Scope after Pratik removed it. I don't have any tests but here is the fix.
http://github.com/xspond/rails/commit/74478bdb2df9439ed8039c180a774...

version.title: [Patch] Lingering use of ActiveRecord::NamedScope::Scope

version.body:
That method wasn't used anywhere, so I just removed it - http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/9a23a0350502c7b3c94cb9ee761dea3bc08c6271
Thanks for pointing it out!
